paper.title: The Research on Credit Rating Evaluation Based on SVM and BNN
paper.abstract: Credit rating evaluation is very important to the credit risk analysis and there are so many studies about it during the past few decades. In this paper we attempt to extend previous research in two directions. Firstly, we apply support vector machines (SVM), to the credit-rating evaluation problem and expect to improve evaluation accuracy by adopting this new algorithm. Secondly, we apply the results from previous research on neural network model interpretation to the credit-rating problem, and try to provide some insights into the credit-rating process. These studies can help users capture fundamental characteristics of different financial markets.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究信用评级评估，这是信用风险分析的重要组成部分，属于金融风险管理的范畴。论文中提到的支持向量机（SVM）和神经网络（BNN）的应用旨在提高信用评级的准确性，进一步帮助管理信用风险。
